description: A tool to estimate brain tissue volume from a single MR image and to compare it to an external standard.

bet_options.title: BET options
bet_options.description: Options to pass to BET brain extraction (inside double-quotes), e.g. -B "-f 0.3"

twoclass_segment_flag.title: Two-class segmentation flag
twoclass_segment_flag.description: Two-class segmentation (don't segment grey and white matter separately)

t2_flag.title: T2-weighted input flag
t2_flag.description: Input image is T2-weighted (default is T1-weighted)

top_threshold.title: Top threshold
top_threshold.description: Ignore from t (mm) upwards in MNI152/Talairach space

bottom_threshold.title: Bottom threshold
bottom_threshold.description: Ignore from b (mm) downwards in MNI152/Talairach space (b should probably be negative)

regional_flag.title: Regional segmentation flag
regional_flag.description: Regional - use standard-space masks to give peripheral cortex GM volume (3-class segmentation only) and ventricular CSF volume

lesion_mask.title: Lesion mask
lesion_mask.description: Use lesion (or lesion+CSF) mask to remove incorrectly labelled 'grey matter' voxels

fast_options.title: FAST options
fast_options.description: Options to pass to FAST segmentation (inside double-quotes), e.g. -S "I 20"
